C

Canvas - Class in view
Handles the look and feel of the study section and begins the test phase
Canvas(Experiment) - Constructor for class view.Canvas
Creates a new canvas
chooseCategory(Word, int) - Method in class experiment.ListSorter
Chooses a category for this word, either 'a' or 'b'
chooseWordType(Word, int) - Method in class experiment.ListSorter
Chooses the word type, either target or foil, for the given word and index
clearScreen() - Static method in class experiment.Experiment
clearScreen prints 30 new lines to the cmd line
correct() - Method in class experiment.Trial
Returns a string indicating if the subject was correct or not in his or her answer
